name: Captain Dinohater: Blast the Past
description:
DISCLAIMER: The WebGL version may not run very well depending on your specs. Please download the game if you are having performance issues.

You're Captain Dinohater and you guessed it- you hate dinos. Wield your unstable weaponry within an unstable volcano to defeat the bane of your existence and uphold the promise of your family name. Blast as much as you can before your guns explode, then THROW THEM FOR MASSIVE DAMAGE.

Play with Mouse & Keyboard OR gamepad.

Weapons become more unstable the more you use them, throw them when they become too unstable and they will explode! The level itself is unstable and constantly shifting, with procedural level design constantly pushing you around the mouth of the volcano.
